mapper.select: select m.name , r.idx as r_idx , t.t_care_type , t.t_cost , t.t_introduce , t.career_experience , t.d_member_idx from d_member m, d_teachercard t, d_reserve r where m.idx = t.d_member_idx and t.idx = r.teacher_idx and r.member_p_idx = #{idx} and r.status != 7

select m.name , r.idx as r_idx , t.t_care_type , t.t_cost , t.t_introduce , t.career_experience from d_member m, d_teachercard t, d_reserve r where m.idx = t.d_member_idx and t.idx = r.teacher_idx and r.member_p_idx = #{idx} and r.status = 7

select k.idx ,k.d_member_idx ,k.k_name ,k.k_birth ,k.k_gender ,k.k_introduce ,k.k_care_type ,k.k_tendency ,k.teacher_type ,k.k_require ,r.idx as r_idx ,r.status ,r.cost as r_cost ,t.d_member_idx as teacher_member_idx from d_kidcard k, d_reserve r, d_teachercard t where k.idx = r.kid_idx and r.teacher_idx = t.idx and r.idx = #{idx}

select k.k_name , k.k_birth , k.k_gender , k.k_introduce , m.idx as m_idx , k.idx as k_idx , (TO_CHAR(SYSDATE ,'yyyy') - TO_CHAR (k_birth, 'yyyy')) as k_age from d_member m, d_kidcard k where m.idx = k.d_member_idx and m.idx = #{idx}

select m.name ,k.k_name ,c.c_writedate ,c.c_content from d_carenote c, d_reserve r, d_teachercard t, d_member m, d_kidcard k where c.d_reserve_idx = r.idx and r.teacher_idx = t.idx and t.d_member_idx = m.idx and r.kid_idx = k.idx and r.member_p_idx = #{idx}
